                    .styleClass("item" + item.getLevel())
                    .text(item.getValue())
                    .opacity(1.0)
                    .build();

content.item: Any visual component is a node

content.name: JavaBean
content.title: Java Beans
content.item:
01 public class JavaBean {
02 
03     /** The bean integer value. */
04     private int value;
05 
06     /**
07      * @param value The value to set.
08      */
09     public final void setValue(int value) {
10         this.value = value;
11     }
12 
13     /**
14      * @return Returns the value.
15      */
16     public final int getValue() {
17         return value;
18     }
19 }

content.name: JavaProperty
content.title: Properties
content.item:
01 import javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty;
02 import javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty;
03 
04 public class JavaProperty {
05 
06     /** The integer property. */
07     private final IntegerProperty intProperty = new SimpleIntegerProperty();
08 
09     /**
10      * @return Returns the value.
11      */
12     public final double getValue() {
13         return intProperty.get();
14     }
15 
16     /**
17      * @param value The value to set.
18      */
19     public final void setValue(int value) {
20         intProperty.set(value);
21     }
22 
23     /**
24      * @return the integer property.
25      */
26     public IntegerProperty intProperty() {
27         return intProperty;
28     }
29 
30 }

content.name: XXXProperty
content.title: JavaFX Properties
content.item: Boolean, Double, Float, Integer, Long, String

content.name: Binding
content.title: Binding
content.item:
01 final NumberFormat nf = new DecimalFormat("0.0");
02 final Circle c = CircleBuilder.create().fill(Color.AQUA).radius(50).build();
03 final Slider s = SliderBuilder.create().min(0.1).max(5).value(1.0).majorTickUnit(1.0).maxWidth(200).build();
04 final Label l = LabelBuilder.create().build();
05 
06 c.scaleXProperty().bind(s.valueProperty());
07 c.scaleYProperty().bind(s.valueProperty());
08 
09 s.valueProperty().addListener(new ChangeListener<Number>() {
10   @Override
11   public void changed(ObservableValue<? extends Number> observable, Number oldValue, Number newValue) {
12     l.setText(nf.format(newValue));
13   }
14 });
Based on the W3C CSS 2.1 (some 3 features)

content.name: FillTransition
content.title: FillTransition
content.item:
1         FillTransitionBuilder.create()
2                 .shape(demoRectangle)
3                 .fromValue(PrezColors.GRADIENT_1.get())
4                 .toValue(PrezColors.GRADIENT_2.get())
5                 .autoReverse(true)
6                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
7                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_IN)
8                 .duration(Duration.seconds(1))
9                 .build().play();

content.name: StrokeTransition
content.title: StrokeTransition
content.item:
1         StrokeTransitionBuilder.create()
2                 .shape(demoRectangle)
3                 .fromValue(PrezColors.GRADIENT_1.get())
4                 .toValue(PrezColors.GRADIENT_2.get())
5                 .autoReverse(true)
6                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
7                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_IN)
8                 .duration(Duration.seconds(1))
9                 .build().play();

content.name: FadeTransition
content.title: FadeTransition
content.item:
1         FadeTransitionBuilder.create()
2                 .node(demoRectangle)
3                 .fromValue(0.0)
4                 .toValue(1.0)
5                 .autoReverse(true)
6                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
7                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_IN)
8                 .duration(Duration.seconds(1))
9                 .build().play();

content.name: RotateTransition
content.title: RotateTransition
content.item:
1         RotateTransitionBuilder.create()
2                 .node(demoRectangle)
3                 .autoReverse(true)
4                 .fromAngle(0)
5                 .toAngle(540)
6                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
7                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_IN)
8                 .duration(Duration.seconds(1))
9                 .build().play();

content.name: PauseTransition
content.title: PauseTransition
content.item:
01         SequentialTransitionBuilder.create()
02                 .autoReverse(true)
03                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
04                 .children(
05                         RotateTransitionBuilder.create()
06                                 .node(demoRectangle)
07                                 .fromAngle(0)
08                                 .toAngle(180)
09                                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_IN)
10                                 .duration(Duration.millis(400))
11                                 .build(),
12                         PauseTransitionBuilder.create().duration(Duration.millis(600)).build())
13                 .build().play();

content.name: ScaleTransition
content.title: ScaleTransition
content.item:
01         ScaleTransitionBuilder.create()
02                 .node(demoRectangle)
03                 .fromX(1.0)
04                 .byX(0.1)
05                 .toX(2.0)
06                 .fromY(1.0)
07                 .byY(0.1)
08                 .toY(2.0)
09                 .autoReverse(true)
10                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
11                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_IN)
12                 .duration(Duration.seconds(1))
13                 .build().play();

content.name: TranslateTransition
content.title: TranslateTransition
content.item:
01         TranslateTransitionBuilder.create()
02                 .node(demoRectangle)
03                 .fromX(0.0)
04                 .toX(400.0)
05                 .fromY(0.0)
06                 .toY(200)
07                 .autoReverse(true)
08                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
09                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_BOTH)
10                 .duration(Duration.seconds(1))
11                 .build().play();

content.name: PathTransition
content.title: PathTransition
content.item:
1         String path = "M0 230.717C0 230.717 206.085 48.7446 313.587 86.8569 421.089 124.969 407.816 319.824 506.692 298.352 605.567 276.881 704.442 -39.8258 800 4.19133";
2         PathTransitionBuilder.create()
3                 .node(demoRectangle)
4                 .path(SVGPathBuilder.create().content(path).build())
5                 .autoReverse(true)
6                 .cycleCount(Animation.INDEFINITE)
7                 .interpolator(Interpolator.EASE_IN)
8                 .duration(Duration.seconds(1))
9                 .build().play();
Allow QuantumRenderer & JAT to run in parallel
